tasks.task: Assembling angled purlins and ribbon boards on a roof.
subtasks: Using a battery-powered drill to create holes for wiggle wire.
Purchasing sharper drill bits from Menards to improve drilling efficiency.
Drilling initial small holes with a longer drill bit.
Drilling precise holes on the back side with a shorter drill bit.
Cutting 16-foot 2x6 purlins into halves due to incompatibility with pole construction.
Connecting cut purlins using another board on the back.
Assembling the other side of the roof to achieve symmetry.
Preparing for the installation of end frames with cautious optimism.
Informing viewers about a $3.99 offer related to the new contract.
Mentioning a ToOTT (presumably a typo or abbreviation) that needs to be addressed.
